import React, { useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import logo from "./assets/logo.png"; import successImage from "./assets/success.png"; import qr from "./assets/qr.png"; const plans = [ { title: "Single Talk Session", duration: "35 minutes", validity: "1 Day", sessions: "1 session", price: "‚Çπ99", }, { title: "One Deep Session", duration: "60 minutes", validity: "1 Day", sessions: "1 session", price: "‚Çπ149", }, { title: "Monthly VIP Plan (Short)", duration: "30 min √ó 6 sessions", validity: "30 Days", sessions: "Weekly support + 2 extras", price: "‚Çπ700", }, { title: "Monthly VIP Plan (Full)", duration: "60 min √ó 7 sessions", validity: "30 Days", sessions: "Intensive full recovery plan", price: "‚Çπ1500", }, ]; const FadeIn = ({ children }) => ( {children} ); function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", image: null }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.send( "service_ted5m2h", "template_5qmfosa", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" ).then(() => console.log("User notified")); emailjs.send( "service_ted5m2h", "template_nzvxr9o", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" ).then(() => console.log("Admin alerted")); setSubmitted(true); }; return (
